items.placeholder: Highlight monthly movement, notable reductions, and buyer demand signals.
Track condo inventory, HOA considerations, and seasonal demand patterns.
Track waterfront demand, dock factors, and listing absorption.

items.a: Monthly, with the last updated date shown at the top. Data is refreshed on the first of each month.

items.q: Can I get alerts when conditions change?
items.a: Yes. Join the Hot Sheet for weekly updates and key market changes delivered to your inbox.

items.q: Do these numbers guarantee timing outcomes?
items.a: No. Market data is informational and helps estimate conditions. Individual results depend on property-specific factors, your constraints, and market dynamics.

items.q: What data sources do you use?
items.a: We combine MLS listing data with our internal analytics and AI-driven market signals to provide comprehensive insights.

items.q: How do I interpret the trends?
items.a: Rising inventory and increasing price reductions often favor buyers. Tight inventory with low DOM typically favors sellers. Context matters - consult with our team for personalized insights.
